Methods

View Source

SetCategory(LogConfigurationCategory, Boolean)

Enables or disables Figaro log categories.

Declaration
public static void SetCategory(LogConfigurationCategory category, bool enable)
Parameters
Type Name Description
LogConfigurationCategory category

The log category to configure.
System.Boolean enable

If true, enables the logging configuration category.
Remarks

Figaro can be configured to generate a stream of messages to help application debugging. The messages are categorized by subsystem, and by importance. The messages are sent to the output stream that is configured in the Figaro environment associated with the XmlManager generating the message. The output is sent to std.cerr if no environment is associated with the XmlManager.

View Source

SetLogLevel(LogConfigurationLevel, Boolean)

Enables or disables Figaro log level features.

Declaration
public static void SetLogLevel(LogConfigurationLevel level, bool enable)
Parameters
Type Name Description
LogConfigurationLevel level

The logging configuration level to set.
System.Boolean enable

If true, enables the logging configuration level.
Remarks

Figaro can be configured to generate a stream of messages to help application debugging. The messages are categorized by subsystem, and by importance. The messages are sent to the output stream that is configured in the Figaro environment associated with the XmlManager generating the message. The output is sent to std.cerr if no environment is associated with the XmlManager.
